channel.title: I need help with commands list
channel.description:
Hi everybody.
I've updated the ::commands list in the MENUS folder on a Xlinescapepk source. I compiled no errors, restarted Moparscape and re-opened run server. NO UPDATE? Still the same, and yet in the same folder (MENUS) i updated ::rules and guess what? It updated. Can you please help me with my problem Cheers Nikk
P.S how can I host my server 24/7 [br][size=1]Posted on: June 11, 2007, 03:13:43 AM[/size][hr]anyone there?
